segments.source_content:
---
id: head-metadata
description: Declaring page-specific head metadata through MDX
slug: /markdown-features/head-metadata
---

Docusaurus automatically sets useful page metadata in `<html>`, `<head>` and `<body>` for you. It is possible to add extra metadata (or override existing ones) with the `<head>` tag in Markdown files:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 會自動為您設置 `<html>`、`<head>` 和 `<body>` 中有用的頁面元數據。您可以在 Markdown 文件中使用 `<head>` 標籤來添加額外的元數據（或覆蓋現有的元數據）：

segments.source_content:
```md title="markdown-features-head-metadata.mdx"
---
id: head-metadata
title: Head Metadata
---

<!-- highlight-start -->
<head>
  <html className="some-extra-html-class" />
  <body className="other-extra-body-class" />
  <title>Head Metadata customized title!</title>
  <meta charSet="utf-8" />
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary" />
  <link rel="canonical" href="https://docusaurus.io/docs/markdown-features/head-metadata" />
</head>
<!-- highlight-end -->

# Head Metadata

My text
```

```mdx-code-block
<head>
  <html className="some-extra-html-class" />
  <body className="other-extra-body-class" />
  <title>Head Metadata customized title!</title>
  <meta charSet="utf-8" />
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary" />
  <link rel="canonical" href="https://docusaurus.io/docs/markdown-features/head-metadata" />
</head>
```
This `<head>` declaration has been added to the current Markdown doc as a demo. Open your browser DevTools and check how this page's metadata has been affected.

translations.zh-hant: 此 `<head>` 聲明已作為示範添加到當前 Markdown 文檔中。打開瀏覽器的開發者工具，查看此頁面的元數據如何受到影響。

segments.source_content:
:::note

This feature is built on top of the Docusaurus [`<Head>`](./../../docusaurus-core.mdx#head) component. Refer to [react-helmet](https://github.com/nfl/react-helmet) for exhaustive documentation.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

此功能基於 Docusaurus 的 [`<Head>`](./../../docusaurus-core.mdx#head) 組件構建。詳盡文檔請參考 [react-helmet](https://github.com/nfl/react-helmet)。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip[You don't need this for regular SEO]

Content plugins (e.g. docs and blog) provide front matter options like `description`, `keywords`, and `image`, which will be automatically applied to both `description` and `og:description`, while you would have to manually declare two metadata tags when using the `<head>` tag.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[常規 SEO 無需此功能]

內容插件（例如文檔和博客）提供了 `description`、`keywords` 和 `image` 等前置元數據選項，這些選項會自動應用於 `description` 和 `og:description`，而使用 `<head>` 標籤時則需要手動聲明兩個元數據標籤。

:::

segments.source_content: The Markdown pages' description metadata may be used in more places than the head metadata. For example, the docs plugin's [generated category index](../docs/sidebar/items.mdx#generated-index-page) uses the description metadata for the doc cards.

translations.zh-hant: Markdown 頁面的描述元數據可能用於比頁首元數據更多的地方。例如，文檔插件的 [生成的分類索引頁](../docs/sidebar/items.mdx#generated-index-page) 使用描述元數據來生成文檔卡片。

segments.source_content: By default, the description is the first content-ful line, with some efforts to convert it to plain text. For example, the following file...

translations.zh-hant: 默認情況下，描述是第一行有實際內容的文字，並會盡量將其轉換為純文本。例如，以下文件...

segments.source_content:
```md
# Title

Main content... May contain some [links](./file.mdx) or **emphasis**.
```

...will have the default description "Main content... May contain some links or emphasis". However, **it's not designed to be fully functional**. Where it fails to produce reasonable descriptions, you can explicitly provide one through front matter:

translations.zh-hant: ...將具有默認描述「主要內容...可能包含一些鏈接或強調」。然而，**這並非設計為完全功能性的**。當它無法產生合理的描述時，您可以通過前置元數據明確提供一個描述：

segments.source_content:
```md
---
description: This description will override the default.
---

# Title

Main content... May contain some [links](./file.mdx) or **emphasis**.
```
